Enable TLS certificate validation (recom: Habilitar validación de certificados TLS (recomendado para la producción).
\n**Gmail Users:**\n<br><br>\nMake Sure:
**Gmail Users:**

Make Sure of the following:
* IMAP is enabled in your Gmail settings (https://support.google.com/mail/answer/7126229?hl=en) * You have created an App Password to login with (https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833?hl=en) * Enable TLS and set the port to 993 and the host to imap.gmail.com
Sets the read status of an email: Establece el estado de lectura de un correo electrónico
Select the parent folder containing the: Seleccione la carpeta padre que contiene el correo electrónico.
El UID del correo electrónico a marcar.
Check to mark as read, uncheck to mark a: Marca para marcar como leído, no marcar como no leído.
Trigger when a new email is received: Activar cuando se recibe un nuevo correo electrónico
\n**Emails Filtering:**\n\nAdd a Router:
**Emails Filtering:**

Add a Router Piece to filter emails based on the subject, to, from, cc or other fields.
